steps: ['Get a nice beautiful color on the burger patty by cooking it in a warm pan with salt, pepper, and butter.', 'Caramelize the onions in the same pan.', "Cook the burger patty for 2 minutes on each side until it's just under medium.", 'Season the burger patty and add cheese on top.', 'Melt the cheese by turning off the heat, placing a lid on the pan, and letting it sit.', 'Toast the buns and assemble the burger with mayonnaise, butter lettuce, tomato, mustard, pickles, and caramelized onions.']
title: The Perfect Burger

steps: ['Crack eggs into a bowl', 'Whisk the eggs', 'Melt butter in a pan on medium to low heat', 'Add whisked eggs to the pan', 'Scrape the bottom of the pan with a spatula as the eggs cook', 'Turn off the heat when eggs are three quarters cooked', 'Add salt, black pepper, and other toppings']
title: Soft Scrambled Eggs

steps: ['Mix 500g of strong flour, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 7g of dry yeast with 3-5ml of warm water.', 'Knead the dough until it becomes elastic.', 'Divide the dough into 4 portions and let it prove for at least 2 hours.', 'Roll out each portion of dough.', 'Top with tomato/passata, garlic, olive oil, salt, parmesan cheese, mozzarella, and basil.', 'Bake in the oven at 180°C for 10-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown.']
title: Homemade Pizza - Classic Margherita

ingredients: ['warm water', 'yeast', 'sugar', 'flour', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt', 'italian seasoning', 'black pepper', 'olive oil', 'water', 'beef', 'bacon', 'pepperoni', 'mozzarella cheese', 'pepper jack cheese', 'cheddar cheese', 'bell pepper', 'white onion', 'jalapenos', 'cream cheese', 'tomato sauce', 'parmesan']
steps: ['Mix warm water, yeast, and sugar in a bowl.', 'Add flour, garlic powder, onion powder, kosher salt, Italian seasoning, and black pepper to the bowl and mix.', 'Make a well in the center of the mixture and add olive oil and water.', 'Mix until a shaggy dough forms.', 'Knead the dough for 4-5 minutes.', 'Roll out the dough to a 16-inch size.', 'Preheat the oven to 425 degrees.', 'Transfer the dough to a 16-inch Dutch oven lined with cornmeal.', 'Prick the bottom of the dough with a fork.', 'Spread a layer of cream cheese and tomato sauce on the dough.', 'Top with beef, bacon, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, pepper jack cheese, cheddar cheese, bell peppers, onions, jalapenos, and Parmesan.', 'Cover with the lid and cook on medium heat for about 20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the crust is crispy.', 'Serve and enjoy!']
title: Ultimate Meat Lovers Pizza

appliances: ['mixing bowl', 'spatula', 'plastic wrap', 'food scraper', 'pizza peel', 'oven', 'pizza stone', 'cutting board']
ingredients: ['warm water', 'fine sea salt', 'honey', 'active dry yeast', 'all-purpose flour', 'olive oil', 'shredded mozzarella cheese']
steps: ['Preheat the oven to 550 degrees Fahrenheit.', 'Combine warm water, sea salt, honey, and yeast in a bowl.', 'Add flour to the bowl and mix until combined.', 'Knead the dough for 2 minutes.', 'Let the dough rise for 4-5 hours.', 'Divide the dough in half and fold each piece eight times.', 'Place the dough in oiled bowls and refrigerate for at least 24 hours.', 'Take the dough out of the refrigerator and let it come to room temperature.', 'Form the pizza crust by rolling the dough and creating a one-inch crust.', 'Transfer the dough to a pizza peel and add desired toppings.', 'Transfer the pizza to a preheated pizza stone in the oven.', 'Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until the edges are golden-brown and the cheese is bubbling.', 'Let the pizza cool slightly before serving.']
title: Homemade Pizza Dough

steps: ['Locate the rib roast and choose a well-marbled cut with bone', 'Season the beef with coarse salt and let it sit in the fridge for 12 to 48 hours', 'Remove roast from the fridge 2 to 3 hours before roasting', 'Prepare a bed of herbs in a roasting tray by layering rosemary, thyme, garlic, bay leaves, lemon peel, and olive oil', 'Roast the rib roast in two ways: the common method and the reverse sear method', 'For the common method, make a mustard rub with garlic, anchovy, and mustard, roast at high temperature then reduce and roast until medium-rare', 'For the reverse sear method, rub the roast with a mixture of rosemary, garlic, mustard, and olive oil, roast at low temperature until rare, then rest, and sear at high temperature for browning', 'Carve the roast into thin slices and serve with gravy or chimichurri', 'Enjoy the holiday rib roast!']
title: Holiday Rib Roast Recipe

steps: ['Cut chicken breast in half', 'Coat chicken in flour, pepper, salt, and pecorino Romano', 'Cook chicken in clarified butter or cooking oil', 'Slice and sauté potatoes', 'Cook mushrooms and shallots', 'Add spinach to the mushrooms and shallots', 'Add garlic, chicken broth, and cream to the pan', 'Plate the dish with the chicken and sauce on top of the potatoes', 'Garnish with parsley']
title: Creamy Garlic Chicken with Potatoes
